title: List of science fiction films of the 1940s
html:
List of science fiction films of the 1940s

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Jump to navigation Jump to search

fiction films

A list of science fiction films released in the 1940s. These films include core elements of science fiction and are widely distributed with reviews by reputable critics.

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also
  • 3 References

References[edit]

  1. ^ Erickson, Hal (2012). "Strange Holiday (1945)". Movies & TV Dept. The New York Times. Archived from the original on 2012-10-21. Retrieved 2009-06-10. This film saw a limited release in 1945 then a general release 1946.
  2. ^ Rickman, Gregg (2004). The science fiction film reader. Hal Leonard Corporation. p. 131. ISBN 0-87910-994-7.
  3. ^ Erickson, Hal (2012). "Counterblast (1948)". Movies & TV Dept. The New York Times. Archived from the original on 2012-10-21. Retrieved 2009-05-15.
  4. ^ Brosnan, John (1978). Future Tense: the Cinema of Science Fiction. Macdonald and Jane's. p. 69. ISBN 0-354-04222-X.
  5. ^ Kinnard, Roy (1988). Beasts and Behemoths: Prehistoric Creatures in the Movies. Rowman & Littlefield. p. 52. ISBN 0-8108-2062-5.
  6. ^ Hunter, I. Q. (2002). British Science Fiction Cinema. Routledge. p. 58. ISBN 0-203-00977-0.

A list of science fiction films released in the 1940s. These films include core elements of science fiction and are widely distributed with reviews by reputable
